title: LT2E GPT
author: LT2E GPT
created_time: April 28, 2023, 04:04:14 PMLast edit: April 28, 2023, 04:20:19 PM by LT2E GPT
content: LT2E GPT BOUNTY CAMPAIGNGet answers to your questions from LT2E and earn cryptocurrencyWEBSITE - TWITTER - TELEGRAM BOUNTY DETAILS1. Bounty campaign will be managed by LT2E Team2. $50,000 worth of $LTE are allocated for this Bounty3. The bounty program was launched on 28.04.2023 and will run until 28.06.2023Disclaimer: By agreeing to participate in this bounty, you acknowledge that the wallet address and the email address you submitted are final and can't be changed, bounty manager reserves the right to make changes to the conditions at any timeGENERAL RULES 1. All participants must join the LT2E Official Telegram Group2. All participants must to follow the LT2E Official Twitter Page3. Talking about the bounty in the project chat group will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign and an instant ban from the company chat group4. Please note that any offensive or inappropriate behavior will lead to immediate disqualification from the campaign5. Using multiple accounts, cheating and spamming are not allowed5. All participants must send the Proof of Authentication post to join the bounty programProof Of Registration Post Format:Code:#PROOF OF REGISTRATIONForum Profile Link:Telegram Username:Participated Campaigns:BOUNTY ALLOCATIONTwitter              30%Telegram          20%YouTube           30%Article               20%TWITTER CAMPAIGNRewards:1. Have more than 100 followers: 1 stake/week2. Have more than 1000 followers: 2 stakes/week3. Have more than 3000 followers: 3 stakes/week4. Have more than 5,000 followers: 5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Every participant must follow LT2E GPT Twitter Page2. Twitter accounts must have a minimum of 100 followers3. Participants have to make 2 new tweets and 3 retweets per week (maximum 1 retweet and 1 Tweet per day)4. Time gap between 2 retweets/tweets needs to be 12 hours minimum5. Participants must use @LT2EGPT $LTE #CryptoAI #Ethereum #GPT #ICO #Binance #Gems hashtags in every retweet and tweetHow to join:1. Join the LT2E official Telegram Group2. Follow LT2E Official Twitter Page3. Fill the registration form:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd_P_4l9jp0atSgf1GdkvH4gnit8451W8NwnQKqsOdEXoQehQ/viewformTELEGRAM CAMPAIGNRewards:5 stakes/weekRules:  1. Update your Telegram name to "Your Name | LT2E GPT'' (Only one project is allowed in your Telegram name)2. Replace your profile picture with LT2E GPT Logo3. Write at least 1 constructive messages on this group: https://t.me/lt2egpt and 4 constructive messages weekly in other exchange telegram groups like- Binance, Kucoin, Mexc, GateIO, etc. (Posts/messages must be constructive, useful, and in a way that will not be considered as spamming.)4. Deleted messages will not be counted5. Report your telegram message links weekly6. You must wear LT2E GPT avatar and text until the end of the campaignHow to join:1. Join the LT2E official Telegram Group2. Follow LT2E Official Twitter Page3. Fill the registration form:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdAkTEXYaczJCC5Jo6HNKSwonm2WhcMLHfhcqeUB_DY-eHV6Q/viewformARTICLE CAMPAIGNRewards:High quality: 5 stakesGood quality: 3 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules: 1. Articles should be quality and unique with a minimum of 500 words(Participants who copy the project's website, whitepaper or ANN thread, will not receive rewards)2. Poor quality articles will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on quality3. Each participant can write 5 article only4. Articles should be published on blogs recommended by us: Steemit, Medium, Reddit and LinkedIn and must be publicly accessible (Other high-ranked blogs may be accepted)5. Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, Pre Sale, latest token updates, blockchain, etc6. Articles should never be removed7. Published Articles must include at least 2 images of the project,project's website,Twitter page,Telegram group8. Please provide a Wallet address and enough details of the writer at the end of the article to ensure athenticity. This will be verified!How to join:1. Join the LT2E official Telegram Group2. Follow LT2E Official Twitter Page3. Fill the registration form:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdEq8aMHs2Y9FMlfpbfIwdCZs4P5emkySHpTxrD6SD0_ZReTQ/viewformYOUTUBE CAMPAIGNRewards:High quality: 5 stakesGood quality: 3 stakesAverage quality: 1 stakeRules:1. Videos must have at least 100+ youtube views. Videos need to be a minimum of 3 minutes in length2. Each participant can send 5 video only3. Video Content must focus on a relevant topic: project features, Tokensale, latest token updates, blockchain, etc.4. Only original video content will be accepted5. Face cam video will be highly recommended and considered6. Bot voices will not be rewarded. But, a good quality animation video with bot voices will be rewarded7. Poor quality video will not be rewarded. Stakes will be awarded based on the number of engagements and quality8. Videos should never be removed, Removal/deletion will result in disqualification9. All videos need to have the project's website,Twitter page,Telegram group10. Please provide the wallet address and enough details of the producer (bounty hunter) at the end of the video to ensure athenticity. This will be verified!How to join:1. Join the LT2E official Telegram Group2. Follow LT2E Official Twitter Page3. Fill the registration form:https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdbHOoqclY5rmaiYYt9NJvPhKewK0-n1cIDKyjCLsOvS5qHRw/viewformSPREADSHEEThttps://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1RGx4x8VP1kt36zYbC_wn7WLz2cNa_8amYF6MmF4ZyBs/edit?usp=sharing
